creator: nmaujean@hotmail.com
text:
the first message I log is written in the catalina.out file under tomcat 
4.1.30 whereas I specify to write it in a file.

The second time, I execute the log.info command, the log is written in the 
file and not in the catalina.out file.

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text:
Chances are this is due to improper logging configuration on your behalf. 
Please bring up the issue on log4j-user@logging.apache.org or
tomcat-user@jakarta.apache.org.  If the issue is confirmed as a bug there, feel
free to reopen this issue and provide the exact steps we can take to reproduce
it.  Until then, please don't use Bugzilla as a discussion forum.
